          <title>
            <string language="en">Lung functions of smokers and non-smokers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lungenflügelfunktionen der Raucher und der 
Nichtraucher</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fonctions de poumon des fumeurs et des 
non-fumeurs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Funções de pulmão dos smokers e dos não 
fumadores</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Funzioni polmonari dei fumatori e dei 
non-fumatori</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ρόλοι πνευμόνων των καπνιστών και των μη καπνιστών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Funciones de pulmón de fumadores y de no 
fumadores</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This graph shows the comparative lung functions of smokers, non-smokers, and those who quit smoking at the age of 45.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">smoking</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lung function</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lung problem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lungs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">quitting</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt die vergleichbaren 
Lungenflügelfunktionen der Raucher, der Nichtraucher und der deren, 
die beenden, am Alter von 45 zu rauchen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce graphique montre les fonctions de poumon 
comparatives des fumeurs, des non-fumeurs, et de ceux qui quittent 
fumer à l'âge de 45.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este gráfico mostra as funções de pulmão 
comparativas dos smokers, dos não fumadores, e daqueles que param 
fumar na idade de 45.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo grafico mostra le funzioni polmonari 
comparative dei fumatori, dei non-fumatori e di coloro che rinuncia 
fumare all'età di 45.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η γραφική παράσταση εμφανίζει συγκριτικούς 
ρόλους πνευμόνων των καπνιστών, των μη καπνιστών, και εκείνοι που
εγκαταλείπουν στην ηλικία 45.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este gráfico muestra las funciones de pulmón 
comparativas de fumadores, de no fumadores, y de los que salgan el 
fumar en la edad de 45.</string>
          </description>
